text: Aka nnaanu na Twam14.1 Ɛyɛ afahyɛ bi a wɔde kae bere a Awurade bɔfo betwaa mu faa Hebrifo anim na okunkum wɔn abakan sɛnea ɔyɛɛ wɔ Misraimfo afi mu no. (Hwɛ 2 Mose 12.11) ne Apiti Afahyɛ a ɛyɛ Yudafo ahomegye nna no adu no, asɔfo mpanyin ne Kyerɛwsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfo no hwehwɛɛ nyansa kwan a wɔbɛfa so akyere Yesu, akum no.
